snippet: The small and midsize companies of the Mittelstand will play a key role in determining to what extent the German economy will continue to provide a counterweight to the recession in southern Europe.
abstract: Small and midsize German companies that are known as the Mittelstand will play a key role in determining to what extent the German economy will continue to provide a counterweight to the recession in southern Europe; Mittelstand firms practice a risk-averse strategy, in which debt is bad and prudence is a higher virtue than profit.
lead_paragraph: The small and midsize companies of the Mittelstand will play a key role in determining to what extent the German economy will continue to provide a counterweight to the recession in southern Europe.

headline.main: German Small Businesses Reflect Country's Strength
